title: Not able to use my router's DNS server addresses
body:
Just starting today, I'm getting RAD errors for the client as well as not able to browse official LoL websites. 

Changing the DNS servers to the google public DNS (i.e. 8 8 8 8 and 8 8 4 4) fixes this issue though, I'm not sure why this has happened suddenly without any warnings. This is the first time happening ever since I've started playing LoL a few years ago and I'm confused as to what triggered to make this problem arise.

Also, note that **I have no problem browsing any other pages or playing other games with my current DNS servers.** It's only LoL that's having this problem. 

Is there a way to fix this problem? I'd like to use my router's DNS addresses instead of the public one due to various reasons. 

Thanks guys, I appreciate your help.

replies.body:
>I'd like to use my router's DNS addresses instead of the public one due to various reasons.

Why is that? Could you list those reasons off.
